item.title: KO
item.description: score:-100 Chances: Dividends may add significantly to your gains during good market times. These are solid businesses to anchor anyone’s portfolio. The $371 billion investment portfolio Warren Buffett oversees at Berkshire Hathaway holds 49 stocks. Three of these holdings are no-brainer buys right now.
